nodes.text: G0-T9 was a droid that had been considered a galactic-level threat at some point prior to the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. When subjected to the Wreyn-Tsatke Cyber-Psychology Scale, a psychological test, G0-T9 received a score of 8-HSM—signifying a level 8 intelligence.
G0-T9 was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the companion character SCORPIO in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
